WorkItem.ClosedComment: WPP can't be run on Windows Server Core.
WorkItem.Description:
Server Core 2012 R2 with WSUS role installed.
Access via RDP, mlogged in as Domain Administrator.

Just extracted to c:\Program Files\WPP and started "Wsus Package Puublischer.exe" from powershell

Created a self signed certificate.
Restarted the server. Now the "save the certificate" Button is not greyed any more.

As soon as click on the "Save the certificate" button, the application crashes  (every time, tried 4 time, 4 times it crashed)

Solutions tried:
restart server

see sreenshot for error-message
WorkItem.Summary: Wsus Package Publisher crahes when saving certificate to file

Comments.Message:
Hi, WPP is not compatible with Core installation of Windows Server. This type of installation doesn't have required component to display the «Save as» dialogue box.
You will have to manage your wsus server remotely.
